actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Amineh Alayan, Amir Alayan, Gertrud Kunz Alayan, Vida Alayan, Ladan Alayan, Houman Alayan, Houston Alayan, and Yassamin Alayan.

summary.text: Declares eight named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Amineh Alayan, Amir Alayan, Gertrud Kunz Alayan, Vida Alayan, Ladan Alayan, Houman Alayan, Houston Alayan, and Yassamin Alayan.
